CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.3.1e, testunit (35AN)
E2B (R3): F.r.3.3 Test Result (unit) User Guidance: This data element captures the unit for the test value. When a UCUM code is not suitable, or results (F.r.3.2) and units (F.r.3.3) cannot be split, F.r.3.4 should be used. Conformance: Optional, but required if F.r.3.2 is populated. Data Type: 50AN OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.8 Value Allowed: UCUM
CustomField.inlineHelpText: User Guidance: This data element captures the unit for the test value. When a UCUM code is not suitable, or results and units cannot be split, Results (free text) should be used.
CustomField.label: Unit
